item.title: Creating Multiple Scenes in a SwiftUI App
item.author: michael-collins
item.description: The latest iPad and iPad Pro devices are ripe and ready for more powerful business solutions. SwiftUI 2 has changed the application model but didn’t really explain how to support some of the features specific to iPads. In this post, I will describe how to use SwiftUI 2 to create multiple scenes in iPad applications.
